articles.title: About me
articles.description:
Hello! My name is Sam. I'm currently a Data Analyst and Computer Science Student (MCS-DS). Visit my Github Pages site for my public [projects](https://parmsam.github.io/projects.html) or [Github](https://github.com/parmsam) for code I've used.

This blog is meant to share my thoughts, personal work, or some things I've learned along the way. Hope you enjoy and learn something new.

Most posts will also be published on my Medium account [here](https://parmsam.medium.com/).
